trans-unit.source: Provides specifications for protocols and data formats for the messages used in the action supported by the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce specifiche dei protocolli e dei formati dati per i messaggi utilizzati nell'azione supportata dal servizio Web XML.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: The `OperationBinding` class corresponds to the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `<operation>` element enclosed by the `<binding>` element, which in turn corresponds to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding> class.
trans-unit.target: Il `OperationBinding` classe corrisponde per Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `<operation>` racchiuso il `<binding>` elemento, che a sua volta corrisponde alla <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding> classe.

trans-unit.source: For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su WSDL, vedere la specifica http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the use of the properties and methods exposed by the `OperationBinding` class.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato l'utilizzo delle proprietà e metodi esposti dalla `OperationBinding` classe.

trans-unit.source: It takes an existing <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> and adds support for the SOAP protocol.
trans-unit.target: Accetta un oggetto esistente <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> e aggiunge il supporto per il protocollo SOAP.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding" /> of which the current <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding" /> is a member.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding" /> di cui l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding" /> corrente è membro.

trans-unit.source: A binding of which the current <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding" /> is a member.
trans-unit.target: Contesto di associazione di cui il <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding" /> corrente è membro.

trans-unit.source: The current <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding> is a member of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding.Operations%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Corrente <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding> è membro il <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding.Operations%2A> insieme.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of extensibility elements specific to the current <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'insieme di elementi di estensibilità associati all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: A collection of extensibility elements.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta di elementi di estensibilità.

trans-unit.source: For more information about Web Services Description Language (WSDL), see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sui servizi descrizione linguaggio WSDL (Web), vedere la specifica http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.FaultBindingCollection" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.FaultBindingCollection" /> associato all'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding" />.

trans-unit.source: A fault binding collection.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta di associazioni di errore.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.InputBinding" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.InputBinding" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.InputBinding" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.InputBinding" /> associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding" />.

trans-unit.source: An `OperationBinding` will be associated with exactly one `InputBinding`.
trans-unit.target: Un `OperationBinding` verrà associata a uno `InputBinding`.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OutputBinding" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OutputBinding" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OutputBinding" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OutputBinding" /> associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding" />.

trans-unit.source: An `OperationBinding` will be associated with exactly one `OutputBinding`.
trans-unit.target: Un `OperationBinding` verrà associata a uno `OutputBinding`.

trans-unit.source: OperationBinding_OperationBinding#5
trans-unit.target: OperationBinding_OperationBinding#5
